titleStmt.title: M. McMillan Eral v. The United States of America. Order to US Marshall

distributor.name: Center for Digital Research in the Humanities

bibl.title: M. McMillan Eral v. The United States of America. Type of document
bibl.note: Our transcription is based on a digital image of the microfilmed original.

body.p: United States of America } SS. Territory of Washington Third Judicial District
In the District Court holding terms or Seattle.
The people of the United States of America to T.J. Hamilton United States Marshall for Washington Territory.

We command you that now have the bodies of L.L. Bales and J.M. Montgomery now in confinement in the United States Penitentiary on McNeil's Island Washington Territory. Before the above entitled Court at Seattle Washington Territory on Monday September 13th AD 1886 at Ten oclock in the forenoon of said day. or as soon thereafter as this writ can be returned. said parties then and there to testify as witnesses in cause no 4901 United States vs. M.McMillan Eral. and we further command now that said L.L. Bales and J.M. Montgomery, after having
testified in said cause as aforesaid, be reconveyed by you and safuly delivered at said United States Penitentiary on McNeils Island to the keeper of said Penitentiary.
and that you make returns of this writ with your doings endorsed hereou
Witness the Hon. Rogan S. Greene, Judge of said District Court, and the seal thereof this Eleventh day of September AD 1886
James Seavey Clerk By James P. Ludlow Deputy Clerk
